passwords.error: Password characters should be range 8-15 characters.
Password characters should be range 8-15 characters.
Password must have at least one number.
Password must have at least one special character like !@#$%_.
Password cannot have consecutive letters and numbers like abc, 123.
Password cannot have Month Name or Day name like Jan, January.
Password cannot have Month Name or Day name like Monday, Mon.
Password cannot have a mobile number (10 consecutive digits).
